code: import React from'react';import SharedButton from'./SharedButton';import ChartBar from'./ChartBar';import ChartPie from'./ChartPie';import{defaultInvoices}from'../mock/invoices';import{defaultRoutes}from'../mock/routes';import{processInvoiceData}from'../utils/helpers';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MainPanel=_ref=>{let{onSelectOption=()=>{}}=_ref;const{monthlySales,topClients,salesByRoute}=processInvoiceData(defaultInvoices,defaultRoutes);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-gray-100 p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl border border-gray-200 w-full max-w-4xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-center text-gray-800 mb-8",children:"Panel Principal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChartBar,{data:monthlySales,title:"Ventas por Mes (USD)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChartPie,{data:topClients,title:"Top 5 Clientes por Ventas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChartPie,{data:salesByRoute.map(item=>({name:item.route,sales:item.sales})),title:"Ventas por Ruta",colors:['#8B0000','#4B5563','#6B7280']})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SharedButton,{onClick:()=>onSelectOption('import'),className:"bg-red-800 text-white hover:bg-red-900",children:"Importar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SharedButton,{onClick:()=>onSelectOption('export'),className:"bg-red-800 text-white hover:bg-red-900",children:"Exportar"})]})]})});};export default MainPanel;
